paper_metadata.title: Evaluation of Ethiopian Productive Safety Net Program

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: Household participation is expected to improve household annual income, smooth different households` consumption and increase the size of livestock holding (TLU), children schooling expense, which are used in this study as indicator of the outcome of the program
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: In this study, improvement in the livelihood of rural households is assessed by examining the impact of household participation in the program

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Ethiopian productive safety net program is one of the largest social protection programs in Africa
evidence_citations.country_citation: Ethiopian productive safety net program is one of the largest social protection programs in Africa
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: improvement in the livelihood of rural households is assessed by examining the impact of household participation in the program
